name: Blood Age General
originalText: {T}: Attacking Spirits get +1/+0 until end of turn.

rulings.text: Blood Age General’s activated ability affects only Spirits that are attacking as it resolves. If you activate it while no Spirits are attacking, it will have no effect, even if you attack with one or more Spirits later in the turn.
Once the activated ability resolves, Spirits that get the +1/+0 bonus will retain it until end of turn, even after they stop attacking or if they stop being Spirits.

text: {T}: Attacking Spirits get +1/+0 until end of turn.
